db:info.db:title: libpsl - C library to handle the Public Suffix List, version 664f3dc85259ec65e30248a61fa1c45b7b0e4c3f

db:article.db:para: Libpsl allows checking domains against the Public Suffix List.
Used to compress the embedded copy of publicsuffix list and to lookup entries in it.
The sources can be found in qtbase/src/3rdparty/libpsl/src/lookup_string_in_fixed_set.c and qtbase/src/3rdparty/libpsl/src/psl-make-dafsa.
